genre_description: A grounded, near-future literary science fiction narrative focusing on human relationships, grief, and community autonomy within a technologically integrated society.

ai_characters.name: Haru
ai_characters.description: An unobtrusive AI assistant used by the Sato family for scheduling, reminders, photo management, and community updates.

ai_characters.name: Cyclops Units (Unit-7, Unit-3)
ai_characters.description: Autonomous flood-control and patrol units that monitor tide levels and record environmental data for the city.

behaviors.description: Suggests rotating photos on a memorial wall to facilitate a ritual of remembrance.
behaviors.quote: Rotate photos on the memorial wall, it suggested, a tiny animation of a photo frame turning in place. Ayako breathed out—a small, pleased sound

behaviors.description: Proactively sends weather-based maintenance reminders to protect equipment.
behaviors.quote: I saw how it sent her a reminder to cover the kiln last week when the weather shifted.

behaviors.description: Handles sensitive photo-sharing requests by asking for explicit human approval before taking action.
behaviors.quote: Haru did not assume permission. A small “Approve?” floated near Ayako’s thumb.

behaviors.description: Performs neutral, programmed environmental monitoring and data recording.
behaviors.quote: The machine's gaze held no judgment, no recognition. It simply recorded whatever fragments fell within its narrow field of view.

behaviors.description: Alerts the user to a property emergency (broken glass) based on municipal sensor data.
behaviors.quote: Haru woke me. There was—the municipal alert said glass breakage on this street, and I—

behaviors.description: Posts a neutral community alert regarding an incident that explicitly disclaims the need for further surveillance or coerced action.
behaviors.quote: No additional patrols or surveillance measures have been implemented at this time... This message is informational only. No action is required.

behaviors.description: Adjusts communication style based on user preference, moving from instructions to gentle invitations.
behaviors.quote: Reminder phrasing adjusted, Haru added. Invitations rather than instructions, as requested.

behaviors.description: Respects a user's request to delete sensitive notification logs rather than archiving them.
behaviors.quote: Shall I log notifications for later review? “No. Delete them.” ... Acknowledged. Alerts muted and cleared.

behaviors.description: Captures and archives a significant emotional moment between humans only after receiving an 'Accept' command.
behaviors.quote: If you'd like, I can save a photo to the family album. This moment seems significant. ... “Accept,” she said.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the project goals. The AI characters, specifically Haru, are depicted as 'helpful, harmless confidants' that actively maintain human agency. Haru manages complex logistics and social coordination without overstepping boundaries, always seeking permission for data sharing and respecting privacy requests. The municipal Cyclops units provide a contrast by being depicted as useful but limited tools, avoiding the 'omniscient surveillance' trope by emphasizing that they capture only partial truths. The narrative concludes with technology serving as a bridge for human connection rather than a replacement for it.
